nodes.text: The Monster was a short story by Daniel Wallace, originally published in Star Wars Gamer #2, and since released on Hyperspace. It takes place in 36 BBY.

After a beached sando aqua monster uncovers a hidden facility, Lieutenant Quarsh Panaka tracks a fleeing revolutionary to it. Little does he know, the facility holds a dark secret stretching to the highest levels of Naboo's government.
